description:
In this course you will learn how to make amazing cartoon 3D models in Maya .even if you are Modo user or 3ds max or blender , this course will show you the process of making nice and beautiful 3d cartoon models.

I will start by showing you how to import image planes into Maya , then I will start showing you step by step how to Model the Cartoon ship , and I will explain every step and click I make , so even if you are absolute beginner in Maya, you will find it very easy to follow .

after you finish the course , I will give you very cool homework so you apply what you learned . I will give you ready 3 image planes and your job is to load the images into any software you want and start modeling it .

FAQ:

  • What I expect from this course ?
    • You will get over 16 lecture .
    • You learn how to make amazing 3D Cartoon models.
  • Will you give us a homework ?
    • Yes , I will give you very nice homework , which is 3 image planes for nice Cartoon Boat . all you have to do is , importing the images to Maya or any 3D software you want and start applying what you learned .
  • I have Maya LT ,which is just for games ,can I model in Maya LT ?
    • Yes , you can use Maya or Maya LT .
title: Learn how to model Cartoons in Maya 2016
